p: Exposure metrics used for assessing the potential impacts of ozone on human health focus on different parts of the distribution of hourly average concentrations. Some of the metrics focus on the relatively higher ozone values, while other metrics focus on a combination of the various parts of the distribution. Supplemental Material describes the exposure metrics in detail. Table 1 lists the various TOAR human-health exposure metrics ( http://www.igacproject.org/activities/TOAR).
